statements: SELECT * FROM user_data;
SELECT username, email FROM user_data;
SELECT user_id, age FROM user_data;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, email, age FROM user_data WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_data WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40;
SELECT username, preferences FROM user_data WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, age FROM user_data WHERE preferences ->> 'theme' = 'dark' AND age < 40;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE age >= 18 AND preferences -> 'language' = 'english' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM User
SELECT username, email, user_id FROM User
SELECT email, username, user_id FROM User
SELECT fav_vr_experience, user_id FROM UserPreferences
SELECT fav_ar_experience, user_id FROM UserPreferences
SELECT * FROM User WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM User WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, fav_vr_experience FROM UserPreferences WHERE fav_vr_experience IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM User JOIN UserPreferences ON User.user_id = UserPreferences.user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT u.username, up.fav_ar_experience FROM User u INNER JOIN UserPreferences up ON u.user_id = up.user_id ORDER BY up.fav_ar_experience DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT user_id, product_id, rating FROM user_preferences WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';

SELECT users.username, products.product_name, user_preferences.rating FROM users JOIN user_preferences ON users.user_id = user_preferences.user_id JOIN products ON products.product_id = user_preferences.product_id;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email, age FROM UserProfiles WHERE gender='M';
SELECT user_id, location FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Interactions WHERE interaction_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS num_interactions FROM Interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_interactions > 5;
SELECT p.preference_id, p.preference_category, u.username FROM Preferences p JOIN UserProfiles u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE p.preference_category = 'Music';
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, location FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT u.username, r.recommendation_score, p.product_name FROM recommended_products r JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT p.product_name, p.price, r.recommendation_score FROM recommended_products r JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id WHERE r.recommendation_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, email, location FROM users WHERE location = 'New York' AND age > 25;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, product_name, recommendation_score FROM recommended_products WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
